item.title: Leaving Alteryx
item.description: After 2 years, last month marked the end of my time at Alteryx.

item.title: You cannot do data science without open source
item.description: While I had a strong feeling back in 2017 when I made my first open source library, itâ€™s even more clear today that you cannot do data science without open source.
